message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Let's split things a bit more evenly this time.  It's still early in the game.
I'll give you a bit more than last time, but I still think I deserve the bigger share
Okay, how about a perfectly even split?  It seems like the fair way to do this.
I'll give you a tiny bit more, but I'm not going for an even split
Alice, we're running out of time!  This money is losing value with every round.  An even split is the fairest and fastest way to end this.
